      • isWithinAcceptance

        private static boolean isWithinAcceptance(Track track,
                                          int layer)
        Extrapolate a track to a layer and check that it lies within its acceptance.
        Parameters:
        track - The track that will be extrapolated to the layer of interest
        layer - The layer number to extrapolate to
        Returns:
        true if the track lies within the sensor acceptance, false otherwise
